page.title: 05 CHILDREN'S PLAY AREAS
page.content: { Carlisle Park}is an ideal place for children.There are climbing frames, swings,a roundabout and slide,a paddling pool and sand pit for the young,and crazy golf,putting,tennis and table tennis for the older ones. Last Summer there was a huge bouncy castle,20p a go.From the promenade you can see the rowing boats - Â£1 an hour. Over the Elliot Bridge are{Swimming {Baths}and a{Cinema;}past the Oldgate Bridge is a popular play area and picnic site -{The Stanner.}Here are the{Stepping Stones}where in Summer children swim and paddle in the river and float about on inner tubes.In Winter the steps are dangerous - often covered with rushing water.{Fishing in {the Wansbeck}is popular with children and adults.A rod licence allows fishing from Skinnery Bridge to East Mill.Scots' Ghyll has its own permit.
